original: 北地泥陽人，歷仕曹魏、西晉，著名文人，尤擅長樂府。曾參與編撰《魏書》，晉代魏後，頗受晉武帝司馬炎重用，官至九卿一級。
text: Niyang people in the north, famous literati, especially good at Yuefu. Participated in the compilation of "The Book of the Wei". After the Wei Dynasty in the Jin Dynasty, he was widely used by Emperor Sima Yan of the Jin Wudi, and he was an official at the first level of Jiuqing.
